DataElement.preferredName: Intratumoral Or Peritumoral Lymphocytic Disease Response Status
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The disease status or response to treatment of intratumoral or peritumoral lymphocytes.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disease Response Domain Intratumoral Or Peritumoral Lymphocytic Disease Response
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A domain for disease response evaluations._Within a tumor._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._Located in tissues surrounding a tumor._Of or pertaining to lymphocytes._The pathologic and/or clinical changes that result from treatment. The changes may include eradication of detectable disease, stabilization of disease, or disease progression.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A domain for disease response evaluations.

Concepts.definition: A domain for disease response evaluations.

Property.preferredName: Intratumoral Or Peritumoral Lymphocytic Disease Response
Property.preferredDefinition: Within a tumor.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:Located in tissues surrounding a tumor.:Of or pertaining to lymphocytes.:The pathologic and/or clinical changes that result from treatment. The changes may include eradication of detectable disease, stabilization of disease, or disease progression.

Concepts.definition: An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
Located in tissues surrounding a tumor.
The pathologic and/or clinical changes that result from treatment. The changes may include eradication of detectable disease, stabilization of disease, or disease progression.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An organizational header for concepts representing mostly abstract entities.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The status of the intratumoral/peritumoral lymphocytic response measured in a biospecimen.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A prominent or noticeable characteristic.: Response; a bodily process occurring due to the effect of some foregoing stimulus or agent.

Concepts.definition: Any act or phenomena, or behavior, constituting a reply or reaction of a living organism or its part to some foregoing stimulus or agent.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Gentle or temperate in nature or degree.: The quality of being within reasonable or average limits; not excessive or extreme.: Response; a bodily process occurring due to the effect of some foregoing stimulus or agent.

Concepts.definition: Gentle or temperate in nature or degree.
The quality of being within reasonable or average limits; not excessive or extreme.
Any act or phenomena, or behavior, constituting a reply or reaction of a living organism or its part to some foregoing stimulus or agent.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.

ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is to be used for CDISC aligned data collection in place of CDE 3918244 from the original NCI Standard CRF Template.
